RelatedSentence: SYDNEY : About 71 days after Malaysia Airlines flight MH370 disappeared , the first book about the disaster will go on sale on Monday with a theory about what might have happened , as the international search continues for the aircraft , an Australian newspaper reported on Sunday .

Flight MH370 The Mystery , written by author and journalist Nigel Cawthorne , does n't claim to have any answers but to some extent supports the theory that the aircraft may have been accidentally shot down during a joint Thai - US military exercise in the South China Sea , The Sun Herald reported .

The book records the events , emotions and theories unfolding on a backdrop of fruitless searches .
